synopsis:
The defender of justice Oshiri Mae Man flies through the air, doing his best to protect the peace in his town. So when a gang of thugs starts to harass a woman on the streets, he boldly approaches. Then, Oshiri Mae Man goes up against a nefarious criminal imposter that's giving the hero a bad reputation.

These videos by Takashi Taniguchi featuring Oshiri Mae Man from his original mobile game.

(Source: Anime-Planet)
